title: Box and cover
description: Cover: figure of a white reclining cat, ears and eyes touched with color.  Copenhagen mark in underglaze blue.  Box: irregular shape with frieze of grey-painted mice.  Projection forms right rear leg of cat.  Copenhagen mark in blue; "Royal Copenhagen" and "324" in green; incised B. 324 G"; all on unglazed bottom.
name: Box and cover
